page.title: 06PIRELLI
page.content: The Pirelli tyre factory is a very big factory near to our school.Many of the people who work there live in the houses around our school.The factory was opened in 1969 and employs 680 men and 10 women.When Pirelli decided to build another factory they looked at sites in a number of towns.They decided on Carlisle because the area has the right kind of water needed to make tyres and they were able to drill a bore hole on the site.There is a good labour force in the city and there are good road and rail communications with the rest of Britian.The firm pays Â£254,000 to the council in rent and rates every year for the site.The factory is open twenty-four hours a day seven days a week with three shifts of workers operating the plant each day.
